about_the_game:
GORECAM is a hardcore 4-player, online co-op, demonic horror survival game.

You are part of a desperate crew—one exorcist and three paranormal investigators—haunted by an ancient evil. By night, explore haunted locations to gather evidence, banish demons, and drag cultists into the light for blood money. By day, scrounge for holy water, ration dwindling supplies, and pray you have enough gas to live another day. Stay on the move. Sleep by the campfire, if you can. The darkness is relentless, and every mile traveled brings you closer to something you’re not ready to face. Confront your friends and your sanity on the path to redemption.

Investigate

  • Immersive Experience: Hyper-realistic graphics and sounds. Demons spread corruption, bending the environment to their will, and perform horrifying acts on their victims and worshippers alike.

  • Full Voice Recognition: Speak ancient rituals into your microphone to exorcise demons, and perform protective prayers with your fellow exorcists and investigators. Speak to cultists and victims of the paranormal

  • Malignant Demons: Demons are unique and intelligent. Each has their own personality and weaknesses. Learn their names. Learn their sins. Exploit them to survive.

  • Equipment: Bibles, holy water, and shotguns. The tools of every exorcist. Camcorders, ghost boxes, cursed possessions, and more allow investigators to gain the upper hand.

  • Locations: Detailed, procedurally generated haunted houses and ruined complexes mixed with hand-placed horror elements ensure that every day is unique.

Survive

  • Your Home on the Road: Your RV serves as your investigative home away from home. Upgrade it with furnishing, cameras, and protective runes.

  • Stay stocked up: Running out of holy water makes any would-be investigator or exorcist easy prey for demons and ghosts. Manage it carefully, and buy it often from the Church. Fuel and food are equally valuable, and the end of either will spell the end of all.

  • Teamwork: Meet death at its doorstep. Face down the paranormal with shotgun in hand, or support your team with motion sensors and CCTV monitoring.

Multiplayer

  • Co-operate: Survive with friends. Demons will target those who walk alone in the dark.

  • Perform rituals with friends: Perform rituals and incantations at the same time as friends to increase their power, with voice recognition support.

content_descriptors.notes: Extremely graphic, realistic violence, gore, and jump-scares not suitable for all audiences.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 3700X, Intel Core i7-9700K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 (8 GB), NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 (8 GB)
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended

short_description: GORECAM is a hardcore co-op horror survival game, designed after found-footage horror films. Play with up to 4 friends and try to escape with your life, and maybe some of your sanity.
